title: Dripstoil
author: Dripstoil
created_time: June 08, 2022, 04:49:03 PMLast edit: July 15, 2022, 06:36:41 PM by Dripstoil
content: I'm accepting few links to my high authority blog. Just few, not more than 10 highly related link back to help you boost your SEO profile. Price: $200 $150 per link. Valid only for today and tomorrow. I'm accepting links from Crypto, Defi, Finance, etc. You don't need to write guest articles, I'll insert your link into existing related article.Contact me via DM or email: ronb02236 @gmail.comFeel free to post your comments and inquire below. I'm online to answer every of your questions.

comments.author: Dripstoil
comments.body: The best way to boost your search engine ranking is to get high quality organic backlink from a respectable site. I've offering limited opportunity to get a link from my top ranking blog. Only 10 links. Contact me now

comments.author: Dripstoil
comments.body: Two gone. Eight to go.Remember I'm not accepting more than ten links. Contact me now with your link and anchor texts. Peace

comments.author: Dripstoil
comments.body: Grab this offer before it's gone

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Dripstoil on June 08, 2022, 04:49:03 PMI'm accepting links from Crypto, Defi, Finance, etc. You don't need to write guest articles, I'll insert your link into existing related article.Can you post an example of what it would look like? Some examples of a page and article where you will insert a backlink.I'm not sure that any link can be added to any article without compromising the concept of the text itself.Also, some statistics on your blog traffic would be useful for eventual decision-making.

Some examples of a page and article where you will insert a backlink.I'm not sure that any link can be added to any article without compromising the concept of the text itself.Also, some statistics on your blog traffic would be useful for eventual decision-making.Thank you for your interest in my ads.

comments.author: Dripstoil
comments.created_time: June 14, 2022, 09:56:16 AMLast edit: June 14, 2022, 10:35:22 AM by Dripstoil
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on June 14, 2022, 09:19:45 AMQuote from: Dripstoil on June 08, 2022, 04:49:03 PMI'm accepting links from Crypto, Defi, Finance, etc. You don't need to write guest articles, I'll insert your link into existing related article.Can you post an example of what it would look like? Some examples of a page and article where you will insert a backlink.I'm not sure that any link can be added to any article without compromising the concept of the text itself.Also, some statistics on your blog traffic would be useful for eventual decision-making.To add a link on existing article, the link destination must be closely related to the existing article. If there's no anchor text that matches the link, I'll edit a paragraph in a way that won't compromise the over all context to match the link.If there's no matching anchor text and edit is not possible,  a new article would be written with the link in mind.If you are serious about jumping on my link back deal, you need to DM or email me to see and evaluate the host site.About the Site Total Unique monthly visits: 230.6kBounce rate: 54%Thanks.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: QuotePlease, comment only on what you're sure of  GrinThanks.I guess vice versa. it is not necessary to comment further on what is clear and what I am sure of, but where there are doubts, right?  Quote from: Dripstoil on June 14, 2022, 09:56:16 AMAbout the Site Total Unique Visits: 230.6kBounce rate: 54%Thanks. in what period are these impressions and whether it is organic traffic or paid promotion?

comments.author: Dripstoil
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on June 14, 2022, 10:22:59 AMQuote from: Dripstoil on June 14, 2022, 09:56:16 AMAbout the Site Total Unique Visits: 230.6kBounce rate: 54%Thanks. in what period are these impressions and whether it is organic traffic or paid promotion?Like I said in my previous reply, send email to me if you're a serious candidate. You'll get the site and do your due diligence before acquiring your link back. Other than that, I'm not interested in a back and forth with tire kickers.
